trans-unit.source: adapya-entirex is a pure Python package: it does not require compilation of extensions.
trans-unit.target: adapya-wholex es un paquete Python puro : no requiere la compilación de extensiones.

trans-unit.source: adapya-entirex is a services library for persistent messaging using the Advanced Communication Interface (ACI) with the EntireX Broker from Software AG.
trans-unit.target: adaptya-wholex es una biblioteca de servicios para mensajería persistente que utiliza la Interfaz de comunicación avanzada (ACI) con EntireX Broker de Software AG.

trans-unit.source: About webMethods EntireX: https://resources.softwareag.com/application-modernization/webmethods-entirex
trans-unit.target: Acerca de webMethods EntireX: https://resources.softwareag.com/application-modernization/webmethods-entirex

trans-unit.source: Copyright 2004-ThisYear Software AG
trans-unit.target: Copyright 2004-ThisYear Software AG

trans-unit.source: Details of adapya-entirex: https://softwareag.github.io/adapya-entirex/index.html
trans-unit.target: Detalles de adapya-wholex: https://softwareag.github.io/adapya-entirex/index.html

trans-unit.source: EntireX is a component in the webMethods high-performance communication infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: EntireX es un componente de la infraestructura de comunicaciones de alto rendimiento de WebMethods.

trans-unit.source: Install and update with the Python package manager:
trans-unit.target: Instalar y actualizar con el gestor de paquetes Python:

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: Instalación

trans-unit.source: It has been used on Linux, Solaris and Windows.
trans-unit.target: Se ha usado en Linux,Solaris y Windows.

trans-unit.target: El requisito previo para la adaptación es la versión 2.7 o 3.5 y superior de Python.

trans-unit.source: adapya-entirex - Persistent messaging with webMethods EntireX Broker
trans-unit.target: adapya-entirex-Mensajes persistentes con webMethods EntireX Broker

trans-unit.source: adapya-entirex is part of a set of Python packages including adapya-adabas a client library for Adabas database access.
trans-unit.target: adapya-entirex es parte de un conjunto de paquetes de Python que incluye adapya-adabas una biblioteca cliente para el acceso a la base de datos de Adabas.
